column3: ‚ÄúI got a decent amount of this from a friend who had decided to grow some Plushberry. It's a cross of Black Cherry Soda and Space Queen, neither of which I've ever tried, but it's a pretty great combination. I was wrecked after a few hits. It has a sort of a fresh violet smell. It's pleasant, but it's not overly sweet like a blueberry strain or a Super Lemon Haze. It has that kind of smell that somebody wouldn't immed...‚Äù

‚ÄúI bought this for my wife's hip pain.  She wanted to get off of opiates for pain. As it turns out she really prefers edibles. For me this strain is great for a good nights sleep. I rarely remember having a dream. But with this strain I sleep well and wake up relaxed and remember having happy dreams. I just retired and am rediscovering the overwhelming benefits of smoking marijuana.  What a wonderful life it is to be ...‚Äù

‚ÄúBeautiful color and frosty nugs. Smell is definitely sweet berries. This was flavorful, smooth, and felt really good. I prefer less of an uplifting high and more of a couch-lock that can lead to sleep. This is personal preference, this is GOOD BUD!‚Äù

‚ÄúI'm not usually an Indica Gal, but Plushberry made a convert out of me. It tastes delicious, like sweet blackberries or citrus. Aside from the lovely taste, I also LOVE LOVE LOVE the effects! It gets me from braindead to deeply involved in a stimulating intellectual conversation within 2-3 hits. My roommates and I have been smoking this lately and I've discovered their views on reincarnation, on intimacy (what does ...‚Äù"

‚ÄúHaving a sister that grows a number of different strains is nice. This one has been great. I have had problems with paranoid episodes that can completely ruin my highs so it has been somewhat of a chore finding what sits well with me. I am slowing breaking into being able to smoke more kinds and plushberry was one of the first. I was able to smoke this over a year ago now and found it very forgiving and pleasant in s...‚Äù
‚ÄúOMG This smells so much like Grape Skittles" I'm in love cause I love Skittles....‚Äù"

‚ÄúGreat med. monsoon season in AZ is a killer for me. I experience on average 3-4 migraines a week this time of the year depending on how many storms roll in. This immediately took tension away from the shoulders, headache tension in the neck and lower head were next .... Helped the aurora around the rest of my head settle down as well. Be careful during day time to not go too overboard it can be a heavy hitter. Day ti...‚Äù

‚ÄúInitial impression: I went back to my usual watering hole at Medicine Man Medical Market in Glendale, CO. I was happily informed that there are new strains that were just delivered; like that of Plushberry
column5: Mob Boss" and a few others. I happily took a gram of all except Mob Boss. My initial impression of Plushberry was welcomed. It smelled great
column6: looked great and caused me to be excited to try a new Ind...‚Äù"

column3: ‚ÄúHeavy relaxation is an understatement this strain proves once again Space Queen gives us some potent strains the only downside to this strain Is the heavy resin production your piece looks like it needs a car wash afterwards the black cherry soda gives it a taste only one can imagine being a fan of Blue Boy from Seattle and blue satellite I wanted to try this strain and the aroma is there‚Äù
‚ÄúGreat berry mint tangy taste. So uplifted and euphoric and relaxing and anxiety-relieving. I get a bit of a headache on this and I definitely feel stoned" less than on my typical indica.‚Äù"

‚ÄúPlushberry is a strain of the kush family from TGA Subcool. This strain is coated with an abundance of trichromes, which make each nug sparkle in the light. Dark amber hairs and hints of vibrant purple can be seen on the body of this beautiful bud. Plushberry has a smell and taste that reminds the user of candy; the smoke is very sweet. That is this strain's most defining attribute. Its taste alone is unique enough t...‚Äù

‚Äúsuper color batman!holy shit pink and purples more then green mark this super crystallized plant the soda flavor is pleasantly heady. .nice stone to boot. it's a fun to grow strain watch as the colors change the last few days is a effing trip enjoy yours from CDXX Boutique in Shelbyville Mi‚Äù
‚ÄúOne of my favorite strains to look at. It tends to be more of a sativa but it's a great anytime bud‚Äù

‚ÄúBought this in concentrate form, specifically the Rythm Plushberry Pen Vape (300mg). Found this to be very effective, gentle, and tasty. I have Lyme disease, and this takes care of the pain, spasms, cramps, inflammation, and sleep problems without any of the harshness I find with the Critique pen I've been using. Does make my mouth super dry, and I'm very drowsy quickly. Will definitely be getting more of this.‚Äù

‚ÄúPicked up some of this from Herbal Nation. Produced by AVITAS with a lab tested 19.12% THC and .76%CBD. Buds are a deep color with tight buds and long orange hairs. It has a very sweet smell and smoke. Very nice heavy Indica (20/80 Sat/Ind hybrid) that produces a fantastic body high. This is some great nighttime bud. A definite stress reliver.‚Äù
‚ÄúHelped me to be creative and relaxe and chill without feeling couch locked and lazy‚Äù

‚ÄúBought this in concentrate form, specifically the Rythm Plushberry Pen Vape (300mg). Found this to be very effective, gentle, and tasty. ‚ÄúWell the only time I have had it was this last week. I only buy Noble Farm products and have always had a great experience with their quality. This is a beautiful looking and smelling strain, but the effects where not what the average smoker is looking for... Great smoke for someone that is just getting back into smoking for legality reasons and the person that had a bad trip that ruined them from enjoying the ganja....‚Äù
‚Äúnice taste, good relaxing indica that helped relieve anxiety. the strain I tried was grown by heavyweight farms.‚Äù

‚ÄúPlush Berry is the first TGA Subcool Seeds offering from the Kush family.  The Black Cherry Soda carried a strong Black Berry smell and taste and TGA Subcool Seeds goal with this new Kush Hybrid was to use this terpine profile combined with Space Queen to increase potency and resin content. 20% - Sativa  80% Indica.  TGA Subcool Seeds.  Parents:  Black Cherry Soda x Space Queen.‚Äù

‚Äú*flower was vaped* 

This is a really awesome indica.
I was on the lookout for one that would feel like I got a huge dose of Xanax, while putting me in a better mood but not immediately to sleep.

This answered the call. 

1. Warm and comfy feeling enveloping my body
2. Immediate relaxation without wanting to go to sleep 
3. No paranoia or issues so far 
 
It also helps with my anxiety, stress and depression. I've be...‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is some of the best medicine I have come across... ever. Very good for depression and anxiety and very little couch lock. Don't get me wrong.. she sends you into a deep relaxed euphoric state, but you can easily pull yourself out and get things done. The flowers I received were over 28% THC and I had no added paranoia or dizziness associated with high THC strains. Very much recommended for a pick me up from depr...‚Äù

‚ÄúI really enjoyed this strain. The experience was somewhat trippy (I kept thinking I saw someone out of the corner of my eye). Tasted smooth and earthy with hints of berry. As soon I got into bed though I was washed over with happiness and completely stress-free. I must've smoked a tiny bit too much, because I was so happy I saw fireworks! This also hit a sleep score of 90% on Sleep Cycle app! Strain 1 of 100.‚Äù
‚Äúnice taste, good relaxing indica that helped relieve anxiety. the strain I tried was grown by heavyweight farms.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is an incredibly relaxing strain. Plushberry relieves all kinds of physical pain and will sooth many anxieties. It doesn't offer a very intense head high but will still leave the user feeling happy and at peace. It's sweet berry aroma is strong and pure. The rainbow of dark purple, green and orange will impress weed nerds all over. It easily puts you asleep which is good for those looking for insomnia relief but...‚Äù

‚ÄúI am in absolute love with this strain...
I had read somewhere that this strain was had some strong aphrodisiac qualities, and that's definitely something I enjoy to explore in a strain..
And holy shit...
I smoked an Artizen preroll and immediately felt a nice cerebral wave of just calm... and maybe about 45 seconds later I just got a warm body buzz... definitely a strain I will keep on hand.

Has a nice taste to it....‚Äù
‚ÄúOne bowl  had me feeling ready to handle the  day ! It's a great looking , smelling and tasting flower.‚Äù

‚ÄúPlush Berry is the first TGA Subcool Seeds offering from the Kush family.  The Black Cherry Soda carried a strong Black Berry smell and taste and TGA Subcool Seeds goal with this new Kush Hybrid was to use this terpine profile combined with Space Queen to increase potency and resin content. 20% - Sativa  80% Indica.  TGA Subcool Seeds.  Parents:  Black Cherry Soda x Space Queen.‚Äù

‚ÄúReally enjoyed this strain.  Excellent body buzz, but it really gave me that think outside of the box" type mentality. The flower was dried almost to perfection with clusters of trichromes.  Very fruity yet earthy smell and taste. Smoked very smooth.  Excellent for Anxiety & Stress or to just take the weight of the day off your shoulders.  Purchased at Emerald Palace AZ‚Äù"
‚ÄúThis is good give it a try trust me‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is a solid Indica dominant hybrid. Standouts include a unique aesthetic and aroma courtesy of the black cherry soda parent. The defects are well-balanced. For this reason it is appealing to a wide variety of consumers, including novices and those whom are prone to anxiety. It's not my fave by any means, but it's definitely good smoke. If you like novelty of taste and aesthetic, you might want to give this unique...‚Äù
‚ÄúNice heavy indica with a nice amount of moisture, nothing too dry but full of flavor and gets you super high for sleep. My go to for nighttime.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is without a doubt my favorite tasting strain. Vaping it tastes so good its almost like I'm eating. It literally tastes like eating berries. My wife walked in the room after I vaped it the first time and asked where the berries are that she smelled. 
The bud packs a potent dose of pleasant relaxation that melts away tension.  Great for an evening buzz when you are ready to chill for the night.‚Äù

‚ÄúAnother tasty treat from TGA. Fruity, tropical blend. Quite stony, in both the head and body. Felt some tingling in my legs and brain. Beautiful plants. Excellent female ratio. So far, every seed is strong and makes it to the flowering stage, where I cull the males before initiating 12/12. The potency is greater than some of the reviews I have read, but it's not a strong as OG Kush, but is worthy of a taste. Yield is...‚Äù

‚Äúfavorite indica forsure. super keefy when broken apart and shredded. smells like a bag of grape candy and sweet dank. super clear euphoric paranoia free kind of strain. too unique to explain lol. try it ASAP!üòÜüî•‚õΩüå≤üçá‚Äù

‚ÄúNice strain for insomnia or when you need a quiet distraction. Quality sleep inducer. Minus 1 star for consistency of the wax product, it was like it was too moist. Overall would def pick up again when it is on the menu!‚Äù

‚ÄúMy favorite strain -- has the calming, tranquil effects of an indica, but leaves the mind agile and ready for conversation or creativity. Good floral/berry flavor, pretty lavender buds -- a delicacy for all the senses. <3‚Äù

‚ÄúDespite the low testing numbers, this shake bag was coated in keif! I noticed the hotter the hit, the more earthy tastes you will get, so smoke with care! A great knock-you-out strain, I felt myself sinking deeper into the couch with each hit!‚Äù
‚ÄúGreat taste, and it made me super relaxed.‚Äù

‚Äúsmooth smooth smooth. ..wonderful color and sweet cherry taste with a small punch of something from the black cherry soda. ..includes some photos of the grow and harvest. ..my patients asked for this and boy I'm glad they did. .added a picture of this being rolled in a raw paper after two months of cure. .gotta love your jars lol good for pain fun relaxing boating camping sleep sex etc awesome all round‚Äù

‚ÄúSleepytime central. As a predominately sativa smoker/consumer Plushberry didn't make me feel high like usual. In fact it took about three or four hits from my vaporizer to get any kind of head buzz. Despite the delayed high, I did feel immediately more relaxed and physically comfortable, as was promised by my indica-loving friends. ZZZZzzzzzzz‚Äù
‚Äúvery smooth and does taste like berries.straight head high while  ease in to a body high‚Äù
‚ÄúThis high is  very relaxing . Calming. Brings down my nerves and anxiety while still having energy and focus‚Äù

‚Äúrecently bought an o to flip around the neighborhood. Everyone has been really happy with it so far. Gets me fried quickly,  but not to the point where I'm out of this world. Overall a great strand. Would definitely recommend.‚Äù

‚ÄúI tried Plushberry to help with insomnia and anxiety and found that 1-2 hits were perfect for me.  It went down smooth and was followed by a faint berry aftertaste that‚Äôs pleasing to the senses. Initial effects included body relaxation and euphoric thinking. About 15 minutes later, the full effects brought a lift in spirit, a bit more talkativeness in social settings, and a wonderful stream of consciousnesses while s...‚Äù
‚Äúvery potent.. good strong flavor, dense nugs. Good strand for energy without anxiety for me and my PTSD‚Äù

‚ÄúThe variation of Plushberry I tried was grown outdoors, and this was noticeable by the appearance. Although the trim job was poor, the effects are fantastic. You can expect some fatigue, like most indicas, but plushberry has noticeable functional effects that make it more like a hybrid. I enjoy that this strain can be smoked at any time of day and was surprsied at the intesnity of its effects.‚Äù

‚ÄúI love this strain. It's not a complete knock out. The thc level is mid range but the relaxing wave that comes over me when I smoke this strain is perfect. It's great for relaxing and at the same time feeling functional and aware.‚Äù
‚ÄúBurned fast. Got very lazy. Flower smelled good and moist but burned quickly and had very large stems in the buds‚Äù

‚ÄúPlush berry has a very citrusy smell, almost like a lemon scent and when I smoked it I rolled it in blackberry flavoured papers which combined well with the flavour of the weed. The high itself was very calm and relaxing, also very giggly. Definitely would recommend to a friend and smoke again.‚Äù
‚Äúsuper powerful, relaxing making it great for nighttime‚Äù

‚ÄúFast acting relaxation. Drowsiness can occur quickly. Helped with muscle tension. Highly recommend, ‚Äúnot the best tasting bud.‚Äù Fascinating combo of parents, check out the lineage through space queen. Romulan and Cinde99 have four incredible parents that tie into multiple more parents. Northern lights #5 is up in there.‚Äù
‚ÄúRelaxing mellow pain reduction.‚Äù
‚ÄúSuper mellow no spinny relaxation and pain reduction. Like it!‚Äù
‚ÄúMy new favorite strain. It literally melts tension and anxiety away.‚Äù

I prefer everything but smoking flower which is just a preference of mine. I like this strain.‚Äù

column4: Plushberry leaves me relaxed and ready for dinner followed by bed. I wouldn't recommend a Plushber...‚Äù"

Closer inspection if the bud revealed purple hues starting from the stem and reaching towards the exterior of the bud but falling just short.

Very frosty with trichomes. Definitely an above average am...‚Äù

You'll love it!‚Äù

‚ÄúNot sure I really care for the crumble concept, it's rather messy. Otherwise good, very smooth, great for insomnia.‚Äù

‚ÄúMedical. 
Plushberry is very medicinal. Off mentally, or feeling terrible? Plushberry will fix that. Make sure the genetics are good. Agroworx is terrible. Suspended is good. Marley natural is the best yet in wa. This strain isn't meant to for getting torn up, it's for putting your quality of life in order.

Highly recommend for anyone with pain.‚Äù
‚Äúgreat indica dominant, very relaxing and calming, but doesn't totally knock you out‚Äù
‚Äúgreat taste awesome buzz try it if you can get it‚Äù

‚ÄúI wish the sample I had was flushed properly because the effects were nice. This has a nice calming/pain killing properties. The flacor is not anything I can describe because it wasnt really there, little to no flush, unfortunately. This is one I will try again, I am not going to let this one  flower go yet. THC 15.1 CBD .07 CBN .13‚Äù

‚ÄúPlushberry by T.G.A. Subcool seeds is a cross between Black Cherry Soda and Space Queen, mainly purple in color, this 80% indica strain has a smell similar to blackberry and a very unique taste too. The main medical effects are sleepiness and pain relief, the negatives seem to be mild but some anxiety may be present but mainly dry mouth and dry eyes are the most common side effects.
